title: P22 Cezanne in use
content:
Why isn't there a site—or if there is please point me toward it—which features great design AND the typefaces used?

Cezanne is quite ubiquitous at this point, I thought by simply poking around a few portfolios I'd come across some good design using it. But, it just hasn't happened. Can anyone help a girl out?
author: Miss Tiffany

comments.content:
Nice to meet you and Miguel.

[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yNNddyLziPs&feature=related](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020165450/http:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=yNNddyLziPs&feature=related "http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yNNddyLziPs&feature=related")

How about P22's own 'in use' pages (which have dead links and not necessarily great examples)?

[http://www.p22.com/inuse/add\_cezanne.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020165450/http:/www.p22.com/inuse/add_cezanne.html "http://www.p22.com/inuse/add\_cezanne.html")
